definition: Unique identifier for a client account within Aurelia systems.
Full legal name of the client as captured during onboarding.
Primary mailing address field from onboarding; may include house number and street type.
Date when the account was officially opened in Aurelia systems.
Account balance in the client's local reporting currency.
Account balance converted to USD using internal FX rates.
Internal agent/employee identifier referencing relationship manager.
KYC completion status (Pending/Completed/Deceased).
AML monitoring alert level (None/Low/Watch/High).
Internal fee tier for the product applicable to the client.
The legal entity where the trade or account is booked.
Channel through which client onboarded (Branch, Online, Broker).
Type of account (Custody, Trading, Lending, Savings).
ISO currency code for the account (e.g., EUR, USD, PLN).
Most recent date of transaction activity on the account.
Number of open operational or client issues linked to account.
Service level agreement category for the client.
Declared tax residency country of the client.
Named beneficial owner when different from account holder.
Approved credit limit for lending products.
Type of collateral associated with credit facilities.
Internal reporting bucket used for regulatory returns.
Source system for the record (OnboardSys, CRM, CoreBank).
Timestamp when the record was last updated in the system.
